title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 25 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 25 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Canada still shut down for covid. Big Tech still censoring the truth about covid. Will Trump start a social media alternative? NY Times story on law enforcement officers all over the country retiring in droves in response to Democrat Defund the Police, anti-police movement. Clay and Buck ask law enforcement officers to call in and share their experiences and they do -- in droves. Jalen Rose makes a racist remark on ESPN.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
